title: Comparison Between Grid Search and Successive Halving
description: This lab compares two popular parameter search algorithms in machine learning: Grid Search and Successive Halving. We will be using the scikit-learn library in Python to perform the comparison. These algorithms are used to find the best hyperparameters for a given machine learning model.

meta.title: Comparison of Grid Search and Successive Halving Algorithms
meta.description: Explore the performance of two popular hyperparameter tuning techniques in machine learning.
meta.keywords: machine learning, scikit-learn, parameter optimization, grid search, scikit-learn playground, hyperparameter tuning, successive halving
